---
title: "Question 2 Analysis"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(fs)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
superbowl <- superbowl %>%
  mutate(ratio = like_count / (like_count + dislike_count))
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = superbowl, aes(x = view_count, y = ratio)) +
  geom_point()
```

```{r}
superbowl_no_outliers <- superbowl %>%
  filter(view_count < 1.5e+05)

ggplot(data = superbowl_no_outliers, aes(x = view_count)) +
  geom_histogram()
```

```{r}
superbowl_no_outliers %>%
  select(view_count,brand)%>%
  filter(view_count > 5000)
  
```


```{r}
ggplot(superbowl_no_outliers, aes(x = "view_count", y = view_count)) +
  geom_boxplot()
```
